FeatureFlags.Name: MAINTENANCE_MSG_SYSTEM_SECURE_REPORTS
FeatureFlags.Description: Message to be displayed during the maintenance on Applicant Portal
FeatureFlags.Value:
One-time EPIC Report Portal Unavailable ##timeRangeStr##.

Due to scheduled maintenance, the One-time EPIC Report Recipient Access is expected to be unavailable beginning at approximately ##startTimestampStr##. The application is expected to be restored by ##endTimestampStr##. All times are calculated using Eastern Time in the United States. Thank you for your patience and cooperation as we work to maintain high-quality on-line services.

FeatureFlags.Name: MAINTENANCE_MSG_IMPENDING_SECURE_REPORTS
FeatureFlags.Description: Message to be displayed when the maintenance is impending on Applicant Portal
FeatureFlags.Value: One-time EPIC Report Portal Unavailable ##timeRangeStr##. Due to scheduled maintenance, the One-time EPIC Report Recipient Access is expected to be unavailable beginning at approximately ##startTimestampStr##. The application is expected to be restored by ##endTimestampStr##. All times are calculated using Eastern Time in the United States. Thank you for your patience and cooperation as we work to maintain high-quality on-line services.

FeatureFlags.Name: MAINTENANCE_MSG_IMPENDING_TIMESTAMP_SECURE_REPORTS
FeatureFlags.Description: DateTime in UTC when the impending message should begin to be displayed on Applicant Portal

FeatureFlags.Name: MAINTENANCE_MSG_START_TIMESTAMP_SECURE_REPORTS
FeatureFlags.Description: DateTime in UTC when the maintenance is going to begin on Applicant Portal

FeatureFlags.Name: MAINTENANCE_MSG_END_TIMESTAMP_SECURE_REPORTS
FeatureFlags.Description: DateTime in UTC when the maintenance is going to end on Applicant Portal

FeatureFlags.Name: MAINTENANCE_UPCOMING_SECURE_REPORTS
FeatureFlags.Description: Flag to indicate if a maintenance activity is coming up on Applicant Portal
